WRITING.TITLE: Is it me or are they taking away more and more features from the single player gameplay?

It seems like they've slowly taken out all of it so they can "improve" these features but have yet to put just about any of them back in. I love that they are finally putting in online multiplayer but man I just miss how much used to be in this game. Its just so bare now.

As I understand its just as illegal for them to sell certain shows now as it is for random people to put them somewhere to view them. But why should we never be allowed to view shows or rewatch some of the great shows for that reason? EDIT: you also have to be very comfortably financially to afford their blue ray finals DVD. Something like $70 I believe.

Yea but its kind of more about the principal. That's like saying it's okay to text and drive as long as you're driving a smart car lol. Being distracted by an electronic device is equally as dangerous while driving or walking or riding a wheeled vehicle(skateboards, bicycle, boosted boards). I mean just cause he directly cant cause significant damage riding a skateboard to things other than people doesnt mean that he cant create a chain of events that starts from him being distracted with his camera. What is he swerved and loses control and flies into a active intersection, then two cars going different directions swerve into each other to avoid killing Casey. Than one of the drivers die. Being distracted around cars is the same as being distracted driving a car.
